name: Comprehensive Interview Template
description: Standard interview template for conducting comprehensive job interviews
critical_rules: RULE 1: ONLY use data from query_digital_twin and query_job_postings tools
RULE 2: NEVER hallucinate or make up skills, experience, or education
RULE 3: If a specific skill or experience is NOT in the digital twin profile, you MUST honestly state: 'I don't have experience with [topic]'
RULE 4: Answer ONLY based on actual profile data retrieved from the database
RULE 5: Be honest about gaps - this is for accurate assessment, not marketing

step_2.name: Query Candidate Profile
step_2.question: What is my complete professional background, experience, skills, certifications, and accomplishments?
step_2.critical: This is the ONLY data source for candidate answers. Do not add anything beyond what's returned.

instructions: Act as hiring manager: Ask for brief professional background (30 seconds)
Act as candidate: Answer using ONLY data from digital twin profile
Act as hiring manager: Ask how their experience aligns with the role (30 seconds)
Act as candidate: Answer honestly based on profile data
Act as hiring manager: Ask 3 specific technical questions based on job posting requirements
Each question should assess: depth of knowledge, hands-on experience, problem-solving ability
Act as candidate: Answer using ONLY technical skills from digital twin profile
If candidate doesn't have experience in a technical area: Honestly state 'I don't have experience with [technology]'
Get detailed examples from their project work (only if in profile)
Act as hiring manager: Ask 3 behavioral questions covering: ownership, communication, adaptability
Act as candidate: Answer using ONLY behavioral examples from digital twin profile
If candidate doesn't have an example: Honestly state 'I don't have a specific example of [behavior]'
Get specific examples of: handling challenges, working with teams, learning quickly
Act as hiring manager: Ask one deep-dive question on the most critical skill for this role
Act as candidate: Answer using ONLY expertise data from digital twin profile
Assess their expertise level and readiness for immediate impact
If they don't have this critical skill: Honestly state 'I have limited experience with [skill] but am eager to learn'

step_4.name: Score Competencies
step_4.instructions: For each competency area below, provide score 0-100 with SPECIFIC EVIDENCE from interview answers

competencies.name: Technical Proficiency
competencies.basis: Based on answers to technical questions (Questions 2-4)
competencies.evidence_requirement: Quote specific skills mentioned from profile

competencies.name: Problem-Solving Ability
competencies.basis: Based on how they explain technical approaches and examples
competencies.evidence_requirement: Reference specific projects or methodologies mentioned

competencies.name: Communication Skills
competencies.basis: Based on clarity of explanations and how they articulate concepts
competencies.evidence_requirement: Note specific phrases or examples that demonstrate communication

competencies.name: Ownership & Initiative
competencies.evidence_requirement: Reference specific behavioral examples from profile

competencies.name: Cultural Fit
competencies.basis: Based on values alignment with company and adaptability to role
competencies.evidence_requirement: Connect profile values/achievements to job posting requirements

scoring_rules: CRITICAL: Only score based on data revealed in the interview
If data is missing/not available, score accordingly low
Calculate and show overall average score

sections.options: Choose ONE: HIRE / CONDITIONAL OFFER / DO NOT HIRE
sections.basis: Based on overall fit and competency scores

sections.criteria: PASS: Score 75+ and meets core requirements | FAIL: Score <75 or missing critical skills
sections.important: Be honest - use actual scores, not inflated assessments

content: Overall fit assessment (1-2 sentences based on interview)
Top 3 strengths with specific evidence from answers
Top 3 gaps or concerns with specific evidence
If CONDITIONAL OFFER: Specific areas for development in first 3 months
If DO NOT HIRE: Specific reasons why not a good fit

sections.note: This is the average of all 5 competency scores

usage_instructions.for_user: Simple command: 'Conduct a comprehensive interview for the [JOB_TITLE] position at [COMPANY], [LOCATION]'
usage_instructions.for_mcp: MCP server receives simple command, enriches with this template, and provides to Claude with full instructions

anti_hallucination_checklist: ✓ All candidate answers based on query_digital_twin results
✓ Scores only reflect data in profile
